website_summaries.verdict: A few hours under the sun powers this watch for months.
pros: 37 millimeter stainless steel case with Hardlex dial window

website_summaries.verdict: Easily dressed up or dressed down, this stainless steel watch from Seiko runs almost a full month on a full solar charge.
pros: Adjustable stainless steel link bracelet with push-button clasp
cons: Adjusting the date can be complicated, and you can only do it at certain times of day according to manufacturer's instructions

customer_reviews.title: WATCH QUIT RUNNING AFTER 36 DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Seiko solar watch from Amazon on March 14 for $81.99. It would stop running every few days mostly at night , even after it was left out in the Florida sun all day, several times. It will not hold a charge. To late to return to Amazon. On April 20, I mailed it back to Seiko repair . On May 7, they tell me it will cost $103.28 to repair!!!!!! I can buy a new one for less! I am still expecting a free repair under the warranty. I have used Seiko watches for over 50 years. They have always been reliable and long lasting. I only hope the company will make good on this watch.
customer_reviews.author: MAT in Sun City Center,FL

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and performing watch
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a nice casual watch, or even maybe a dress watch, this is the way to go. I have been looking for a while at many different brands and types. This watch stood out to me for being high quality with an affordable price. Only downside is that when you first get it you have to charge it up by putting it in the sunlight or under a light. But you should expect this since it is a solar watch. Extremely pleased with this product, I look at it all the time when it is on my wrist because I can not stop looking at how good it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Sage R

customer_reviews.title: Dead after less than two years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch in February 2018 and have worn it to the office most days since then. I have been very happy with the watch until a few weeks ago it started losing time. Now, in September 2019, it does not run at all even after being in the sun for hours. Hopefully Seiko will fix or replace this watch under warranty, and I'll update this review if it does. I have not had issues like this with other Seiko watches I've owned...
customer_reviews.author: shade tree mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Bad design on wristband makes watch useless!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this watch was a great value but because of band issues, it's a dud. The band is attached via a very flimsy, small spring-loaded pin. This pin becomes un attached to the watch very easy, like when you take a jacket off and it catches the watch. You then must find a shop to fix it, as it's a super hard thing to replace without proper tools and great eyes. After three times comiijnb unattached using two different bands, I give up. terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, all-round-wear wristwatch
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned this for a week or so, but everything works fine thus far. Obviously, durability assessment will require months or years. With the help of YouTube videos, adjusting the size of the watch wristband was easy and didn't require tools beyond what I already possessed. The solar recharge feature works fine so far. When the watch arrived I set it up in the winter sunshine coming through a west window and that seemed to kick-start the movement. (The second-hand increments in two-second jumps if the watch is low on battery, and one-second jumps if it has an adequate operating charge -- according to the user manual.)
customer_reviews.author: Bellinghamster

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for Quality Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: This watch has classic styling, excellent quality and feel, and the trusted Seiko name. At $85 the price can't be beat for a great watch. I gave four stars for scratch resistance because the bracelet will scratch - it is inevitable. Perhaps someone can make their millions by making a bracelet guard. I really like this watch, and you won't be disappointed if you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Parshman

customer_reviews.title: Expect 7 Years
customer_reviews.text: Unobtrusive, excellent accuracy, durable. Pretty much the whole package. This watch has been subjected to severe abuse (masonry repair, corrosives, scuba diving, etc.) and has only a few scratches. Great value, but nothing (under $3000.) lasts forever. Solar cell dies after 7 years. Nightime luminousity is short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Ubiq

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Caravelle for more than a decade and the bracelet needed replacement. It was a $100 watch and I didn't wan't to spend $40 on a new bracelet so I decided to get this Seiko watch instead. I am extremely pleased of my purchase. I wasn't sure about the solar charging but it's been entirely uneventful. I put the watch on a few months ago and never looked back. I do wear my watch all the time except when I shower so the watch gets the light by simply wearing it normally. Love it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE GARNEAU

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Seiko standards,
customer_reviews.text: I think Seiko has let their standards fall a lot. I bought My first Seiko watch 40 years ago. I was still in the navy at the time. I have bought several Seiko watches since then. I have never had a Seiko watch which had a small chip in the face which I did not notice until it grew and the Watch does not work as it should. It still works but at times it just stops and I can shake it and it will run again. I have done nothing to cause this damage.
customer_reviews.author: Harold M Albertson

customer_reviews.title: "Seiko" means accurate!! - First month - works with as perfect accuracy as I can imagine
customer_reviews.text: First 30 days - works with as perfect accuracy as I can imagine. Left it in drawer over holiday for 5+ days and it lost zero time. I have only charged it in ambient inside (incandescent or LED) lighting. Band will need almost one link removed for best fit for my 7 1/2 inch (19cm) wrist. Adjustment but will take special care and special tool or a friendly watchmaker. But I would rather it be too loose than too tight. Links are 10mm wide. There's a little 2.1mm pin adjustment on the clasp itself already set at max. The Stainless SteelBand is just right: not heavy and not light.
customer_reviews.author: QAWeb

customer_reviews.title: 100% SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: First watch I have bought in more than 30 years, Ive always wanted a Seiko and I couldnt be more satisfied with this high quality Japanese made watch. Feels very comfortable, was very easy to shorten the band (many youtube how to videos) and worked straight out of the box, keeps perfect time. As a Solar City solar panel customer I am very proud to show off my SOLAR watch!
customer_reviews.author: rickwalkerjr

customer_reviews.title: Sun charging means no batteries; stylish and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Seiko of the same style. The first one lasted over 5 years of daily use and had to be replaced when the day feature stopped working. It is a good watch for formal and informal events. Consider buying the product to use for adjusting the links unless you know somebody at a local jewelry store. It was very easy to remove some links when you are using the right tool.
customer_reviews.author: Go Seahawks!

customer_reviews.title: This is my daily driver at work
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily driver at work; it's stylish, understated, fits my wrist well, and should never need a battery replacement. It also reminds me what day of the week it is so I don't make (more of) an ass of myself in front of co-workers. This is way more stylish than all the apple watches and fitness trackers I see; simple, classic, understated. Easy-on-off before meetings so it doesn't interfere with all the typing I do at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: The Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch when my 10-year-old Seiko watch stop working. This is a beautiful watch and can be used for dress-up or casual. For the most part it is easy to read unless you have a bright overhead light shining into the face. I've had it for a month or so and it has no scratches and keep absolutely perfect time. This is my first solar watch and I'm sold on Seiko and so it watches.
customer_reviews.author: Bart M. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My dad has only word Seiko for years and the day and date stopped working on his watch. He was having trouble finding a jeweler who would repair it without sending it out as he didn't want to be without his watch for weeks. Instead of repairing the old one I found this one for him. It was a great price and it being solar was just a bonus as now he never has to worry about replacing the battery. Gave it to him for Christmas and a month later he couldn't be happier with it. Definitely a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch, but difficult to get started
customer_reviews.text: First impression: Too nice and too beautiful. I love its small case, best for small wrist guys like me. Drawbacks: Difficult to get started setting up the day and time, VERY DIFFICULT to pull out the crown to first click. Another drawbacks: Doesn't come with any tool to adjust the steel band and I had to purchase some tools elsewhere and the steel band gets scratched badly. Amazon should think about improving customer service on these items
customer_reviews.author: Flower Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for 2 years, then started randomly losing a few hours a week. After a few months of that, it would just stop running at least twice a week, and I'd have to tap it to get it going again. It would even be stopped when in direct sunlight. By contrast, I've had a Citizen solar for 15 years, and that still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fls Run

customer_reviews.title: Classic look a must have
customer_reviews.text: So this watch is great! When i first got it i had some issues with setting it up. But after reading the instructions a couple times it was easy. My wrist was to small for the stock band so i spent $6 on a band adjusting kit and now it's perfect! It really brings out every thing i wear and gets plenty of compliments. We'll have to see how long the solor power works i know citizens watches came out with it first but maybe this is perfected. Great price great product and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: andrew cooke

customer_reviews.title: Solar Disappointment, DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have at least three Seiko watch before. It is a good brand. Every watch works up to my satisfaction, but eventually broke down after change of battery. I thought solar powered is the solution. I have used this watch for 10 month. The solar battery broke down after an oversea trip. Now, the watch stops working without light. It is a disappointment. The solar power never worked again and I throwed it away. It is a WARNING to other consumer that you should not buy SEIKO SOLAR watch ever. It is too risky and is my final update. I am using iWatch happily now.
customer_reviews.author: Niann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It's not too large but it's easy to read. I had to remove a few links. The watch band is now a little snug, but if I add a link back in it will be too loose. I wish there were are few more adjustment holes in the clasp to make finer adjustments, but overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MangoMan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up....started working quickly after short exposure to hot Florida Sun...
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday watch...easy to set up....sells up to 50% higher on other websites......Looks very nice....does what it needs to do....Easy to read....and luminous dial is nice touch...Great value for the money....and of course, it's a Seiko! I also like the "lighter" weight of this vs my previous Seiko. You'll be happy with this dependable watch; can't be the value under a $100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O.

customer_reviews.title: A steal at twice the price. Understated elegance personified ...
customer_reviews.text: A steal at twice the price. Understated elegance personified. Works with a $2000.00 Armani suit or a pair of Levis jeans. Defines class because it doesn't scream it. Dead on quartz accuracy. If your taste runs to oversize "look at me" watches, skip this one. Leave the automatic and mechanical watches to the illogical and irrational crowd. This watch is quiet confidence and smugness all rolled into one. Also available with a white face, model SNE031.
customer_reviews.author: Steelheart1948

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Keeps good time and looks great. Expansion bracelet is very comfortable, will not slip off my wrist. I like it so much I wanted to give it as gift to my son and two of my buddies. Unfortunately it is discontinued so I was not able to gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Babits

customer_reviews.title: Seiko makes the best watches
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent watch that had all the features I was looking for: day, date, second hand, black face, stainless steel, and solar powered. Seiko makes the best watches; this is only the third Seiko I've had in the last 50 years, and I only replaced my previous Seiko because I wanted a solar powered watch to replace the previous battery-powered one. Buy a Seiko and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Whodis

customer_reviews.title: Seiko black dial Solar
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to address the watch is authentic and a great great buy if you are looking for a daily watch. This seiko model provides amazing value for the price and it’s definitely quality. Removal of the links was simple and not too difficult. Be careful of the clasp link as it has a spring on both ends so don’t lose it! I would definitely recommend this time piece for the avid watch enthusiasts. Seiko is top class.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Floyd

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right and the Watch Functions Well
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this watch. I read some of the other reviews where people had difficulty setting the time/date, but I did not. I followed the instructions as provided in the shipment and had no issue whatsoever. Yes, it means a little bit of winding to make the dates line up. Overall, the watch is working well and looks nice. I did use some WD-40, as others wrote, to stop the squeaking noise from some of the links. Simple fix and, considering the brand, well worth doing for the cost of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for anyone or your self. Classy Seiko.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a christmas gift, very pretty looking watch, shiny and clean look. The dial is great with its grooves, and the lume is bright but just does not last very long. Solar is good and seiko is a great company, their solar watches are usually efficeient to the point that 8 minutes of direct light can power the watch for up to a year in total darkness. It has a nice feel and professional look to it, sometimes i take it so i can wear it. Pins were easy to push out to adjust size. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pathik

customer_reviews.title: Short (or no) sleeves only!
customer_reviews.text: This watch, unlike a similar Seiko solar powered watch I own, will only hold its charge for more than a few hours if regularly and for extended time it is exposed to direct sunlight. Fluorescent or incandescent light seems insufficient to enable a charge of more than a few hours to a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I had this same watch for 8 years before it quit working and I replaced it
customer_reviews.text: The watch was never used for diving ( not rated for that type of use ) and was a good serviceable watch for 8 years . No batteries to replace yearly . Good value for the money . This new watch works fine out of the box. I had to adjust the metal band , an easy job. I purchased an " extended warranty " from Square Trade and never got it . Do not waste your money on the " extended coverage " offers .
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: I *do* like my Seikos, so this continues my love affair!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, I've loved Seiko watches ever since I bought my first self winding Seiko in Japan in '66, thanks to the Army for sending me there! The idea of a solar watch was appealing since I seem to constantly have to change batteries in my gold Seiko dress watches - and that's a pain! While I've only had the watch for a month now, it's second for second accurate with the computer - I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: al jones

customer_reviews.title: Practical, economic and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value - so why buy an expensive piece of jewelry (e.g. a Piaget, Cartier, Rolex, Omega) which requires huge maintenance costs and keeps poor time? This watch is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nosretap

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this watch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this watch. It was a replacement for my husband's everyday watch that unfortunately fell off his arm in a field. He was elated with this as a replacement. We are both long-time Seiko watch customers, and intend to be until we can no longer get them if that ever happens.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R

customer_reviews.title: ... this watch for his birthday and it was a perfect choice. It looks great on his youthful wrist ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson picked this watch for his birthday and it was a perfect choice. It looks great on his youthful wrist and for quality and value you cannot do better than a Seiko. I have been a fan since my first Seiko purchased at the Cholon PX in Saigon in 1969. It is still running like new.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: The watch is under warranty (3 year), so I will try to send it in. While it worked, it was fine. You do not have to leave it directly in sunlight to charge.
customer_reviews.author: rcl

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and works too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, easy to read and looks great ( also can’t beat the Amazon price!). Set up took me a while but relatively easy ... chargedover night under a refusal floor lamp and works like a dream...this watch replacedmy fathers old Rolex ( which I passed down in the family) and looks as good as that 6000 dollar watch !!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: May take a day or two to get the day - and preferred language - squared away.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly - has day & date, as I require, and needs very little light to keep it fully powered. Band was about 2 links too big - Youtube video helped me pop the extra links out. Fits great, is lightweight, and is not ostentatiously covered with gold or unnecessary bling. Wouldn't hesitate to buy another, or give one as a tasteful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Nice smaller sized watch. I have to have a watch with a sweep hand for work and this one fits the bill. It’s big enough to read but small enough to stay out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlandbill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It loses time. Within an hour it loses 15 minutes. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is an amazing value from Seiko. I love the way it looks and you can easily dress it up to look far more expensive than it is. It is very lightweight as well. I am really satisfied and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Snow

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the best I have ever bought and also the most expensive. I have owned this watch for 2 months and have had no problems with its operation and is super reliable. The only issues I have ran across was that you cannot wear it immediately because the links on the chain have to be taken out first in order to wear it. The second issue is that the sliver band surface scratches rather easily but doesn't really much less shiny. Overall, if you want a classy solar charged watch this is the product for you
customer_reviews.author: Wesley B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Direction are a bit Sketch on setting the day and date. Once you figure it out, though, the watch Works perfectly. Need to take to jeweler to adjust the bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it all was matte chrome but that's personal ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch is well described by previous reviewers. Bulkier than the ultrathin watch it replaced but not atypically bulky or heavy and a lot less expensive. It would be nice if it all was matte chrome but that's personal preference. Did have a jeweler remove one link in the band at a nominal cost since it became apparent one should know what they are doing. Summary a good value and no unexpected surprises.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value.
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not review products purchased from Amazon. This is an exception. This watch is simply amazing for the price! It is hefty and well made. I find it very attractive and functional. It is easy to read and the dial lights up at night. Superb value for the money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levine

customer_reviews.title: after some problem of getting it started, it worked fine until now.
customer_reviews.text: three days ago it died on me. I have been trying to get it started again by exposing it to light for two days. At first the date and day would change properly. Today, not only did the time not start functioning but also the date remained yesterday's date. I don't know what to say, but it is not performing as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Hanish

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like A Much More Expensive Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Although the band was much too large, I was able to remove four links, (using a newly-purchase watch repair kit from Amazon) and now it fits perfectly. Looks like a much more expensive timepiece than what I paid for it on Amazon. Am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. J

customer_reviews.title: Days are in SPANISH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and a generally-nice watch, but I received a watch with the dates in Spanish. I speak a bit of Spanish, but I am far from fluent. This is frustrating but otherwise seems to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY, LOOKS-GREAT AND REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: A gift from my wife; I love it. I would gladly recommend this handsome, high-quality watch. Have had it for some time now and it has always performed with ordinary in-home lighting during the daytime where I spend most of my time now.
customer_reviews.author: VINSON D HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Stops, Often Multiple Times per Day
customer_reviews.text: After about 9 months, the watch keeps stopping. Apparently the stem does not stay firmly in place. When I squeeze the stem in firmly, the watch runs fine for a day or so. But I'd like the time to be accurate for several days at a time, if not months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken band
customer_reviews.text: Band broke at bezel attachment point Unable to remove that pin. No replacement band available on amazon
customer_reviews.author: BLUEDOG☆

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic watch and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic watch and I absolutely love it. Not too big. Elegant yet manly. Love the bigger day and date, makes it easier for my old man eyes to see!! Keeps great time! Get lot's of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Todd L.

customer_reviews.title: A good quality watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had a series of cheaper watches for some time now, but have always missed my old Seiko, When my Timex one died after 6 plus years of use, I decided to "upgrade" back to a Seiko. I was a little surprised to find that you can now get a watch with an embedded solar cell so you never need to replace a battery. That sold me on this one!
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Other than that one feature I am very pleased with the watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch works very well. My only problem with it is that the chips that allow you to see the time at night in the dark do not last very long.Other than that one feature I am very pleased with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Francis J Murray

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the new watch.
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch a little over a week ago and I am happy with it. It works well and looks good. After removing two links, I was able to adjust the band to provide a fit suitable for my wrist. Because I have a simple watch repair kit that I have used to replace batteries, this was fairly simple. If you do not have such a kit, you will need to take the watch somewhere to have links removed if needed to get a proper fit. The clasp provides minimal ability to make adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M.

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Seiko Watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch a lot. It's stylish without being gaudy or ostentatious and, as has always been my experience with Seiko watches, it's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: SEIKO SNE039 IS FINE.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine watch. I am completely satisfied so far. This is the solar version of the same watch I had a battery powered version of. So I was familiar with the general characteristics of the watch, and I am happy not to have to have the battery replaced periodically.
customer_reviews.author: REFBOOTS

customer_reviews.title: Sieko
customer_reviews.text: i keep buying this kind of watch cause it is a quality product. Great and fast service cause I feel lost with out my watch. Great job
customer_reviews.author: magnum38

customer_reviews.title: No Batteries, Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! Easy to read, classic look and no battery!! Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: First watch on my hand
customer_reviews.text: This is first time I am purchasing and wearing a watch. I must say, this is one of the greatest decisions I've made accessories wise :) This model looks ten times better in real life than it is shown here in pictures. Those look amazing with both casual or business clothes. Size and fitment is as excepted. Buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. The solar panel face is really cool ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. The solar panel face is really cool and works fine. The only problem is that because it's black and the arms and hour points are silver, it can be difficult to see in bright sunlight or under bright spotlights when I'm on stage. Not a big deal, but worth a mention.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lundell

customer_reviews.title: No issues compared to other reviewers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my watch 15 Dec 2015, and have had nothing to complain about at all. Arrived in like new condition. I followed directions for charging, and it has worked as advertised for these past 2.6 years. When I'm not wearing it I have it next to my desk lamp, so regular lighting has kept it fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Men's Solar Watch
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it would be possible to purchase a better watch for the money. in fact, I liked this Seiko Solar watch so much that I purchased one for a close friend and also purchased a ladie's Seiko watch for my wife. She loves the watch, and my friend loves his watch. You can't go wrong with a Seiko Solar watch unless you are looking for something that cost a lot more money and a piece of jewelry is what you are after. This isn't a Rolex, but a trouble free watch that works great.
customer_reviews.author: thomas dalton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Took it swimming in the ocean and worn while showering. Haven’t encountered any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice looking watch at a great price. I paid the $10 to have the professionals get the band at the right size. Easy to set (hint for the date- turn the dial the other way) and great to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little beater watch
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Purchased on 1/2/2020. Great little watch. Looks great and is working like a charm. Removed 3 links to fit my 7inch wrist from the stock bracelet. Super light weight with a nice fit. For less then $70 I’m very happy with it. I let it sit in the sun for 7 hours to charge it up. It’s a nice addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this watch!! We got a great price for it so that made it an even better. It looks way more expensive than what we paid. If you’re considering it you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda N.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a watch that wouldn't require much attention (i.e., no winding, no batteries). A few years ago I purchased a Seiko kinetic watch, hoping that it would address this problem. After less than 2 years, the kinetic watch would not hold charge more than a day, so I decided to look into the solar option. The review of this watch suggest that it will hold charge for weeks. Only time will tell if that's true. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Cherchi

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch and is appealing to the eye. It was easily set after reading the directions twice. The time piece itself sits a little high and has a bulky feel but I have small wrists. Weight is good but if you work blue collar it's a little dainty and scratches easly. To remove links follow the arrows on the back of the band and use a thumbtack to push the pins out.
customer_reviews.author: brad gibson

customer_reviews.title: My new Seiko solar watch is great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new watch, and, never having had a solar, but knew of the Seiko brand, decided to give it a try, and I am extremely happy with it! It's stylish but not gaudy, the date and time is synchronized perfectly, and it does what a watch is supposed to do--tell perfect time! I had several links from the band removed by a local jeweler at no charge, and now it fits my wrist most comfortably. It's a great watch at a great price, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: dinoman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, I wear it every day. Keeps good time, looks good. Cheap bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fine watch for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is handsome and is the ultimate set a forget format. Quartz and solar powered. Very convenient. The bracelet is adequate. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Maaark

customer_reviews.title: Sam
customer_reviews.text: If you want a handsome go any where wrist watch that exudes quality in any environment buy Seiko. The SNE039 Solar Seiko is no exception. And as a member of the Seiko family it also provides extraorrdinary time keeping accuracy in spite of it's relationahip to the famly of automatc warches. This due to the long-life solar ( and any other light source ) charged long life battery that provides a practicallyconstant amount of power to the watch movement.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a high school graduation gift - he also received a smart watch, but this one will look much more professional when he is interviewing for a job, besides, a man can never have too many watches!
customer_reviews.author: Anele B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert on watches, but I picked this one out based on reviews and the quality is amazing. I picked this to give to my boyfriend for our anniversary and he wears it everyday. It looks really nice and the solar feature is very convenient. He uses this for work (with a suit) and also on weekends in casual clothes and it is a really nice piece that goes with everything. Shipping was unexpectedly fast too. I placed my order and received it 2 days later!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I fully expect to be totally satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only had it for a few days, it is a very attractive watch. It keeps time perfectly. After taking it to a jeweler to have the band adjusted because it required a special tool it fits very well. I have a small wrist but it is thin enough so that it does not look oversized. I purchased another Seiko brand watch this morning. I fully expect to be totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: WALTER BRUMIT

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this watch for me as a gift. I have owned it for 3 weeks and so far it has worked just fine. The bracelet adjustment is easy and straight forward, Adjusting the date and day took a while and is now at the correct day and date. As suggested I placed the watch in the light for the first few days. It keeps good time and is comfortable to wear. I like the watch and it looks nice. I would recommend it as good buy at this time. Fred
customer_reviews.author: Linda Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. The promise of long term service without a battery change makes it ideal for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rambler T

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very good quality i had to resize it because it was too big for my wrist that was my only complain and its not really that water resistant i whould trust water near it over all its an amazing watch i didn't even know it glows in the dark until a month ago its a really neat watch
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch and it size is perfect for my wrist. Since this watch is only water resistant, I don't plan to dive or swim with it. I find it is a great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Piche43

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch and the band was easy to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned it long, but so far it is ok. Great looking watch and the band was easy to adjust for my wrist size.
customer_reviews.author: deadeye charlie

customer_reviews.title: solar watch
customer_reviews.text: i will never buy this again cause it stopped working after 5 months and the warranty company with amazon said to call Timex but it it a seiko that i dont understand
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rybold

customer_reviews.title: and it has kept perfect time so far
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch 2 weeks ago, and it has kept perfect time so far. It fits well and looks attractive. The best feature is that it is solar. So it should not need new batteries every 2 or 3 years. Let us see!
customer_reviews.author: Show-Me Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 4 stars - but then after serious consideration, I gave it a full 5. I just wish the day/date was a little bigger. But that's not the fault of the watchmaker - my eyes are just failing me in my old age! I've owned Seiko watches before and they've never failed me - I do not see a reason why this one would be any different. LOVE IT, so far!
customer_reviews.author: D. Agnone

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch very much, with one complaint that is minor and (I hope) temporary: I am having a great deal of trouble setting the day and time correctly. The instructions are not clear, and I'm not even sure they apply to this model of watch and are up-to-date. It is difficult to set both day and date correctly, and the date often changes early. Do I have to do this in the morning to get the date to change only at midnight?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but overall nice watch for price
customer_reviews.text: Watch face is a bit small compared to a 40-43mm case, but overall nice watch for price. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, very light, very accurate, I am very satisfied with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but battery failed ~1 year
customer_reviews.text: Allegedly the battery recharges via light exposure. Mine failed after ~1 year. To date, Seiko has not honored the three-year warranty. I bought another Timex...
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a night on the town
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this watch. Its a nice looking and not too big on your arm. Its great for a night on the town.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for several months now. It keeps time perfectly and withstands the abuse of daily wear in harsh environments (vehicle maintenance, home remodeling, etc). It always seems to maintain a charge even though I'm not outside for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: H. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This watch is very nice. Bought it for my dad for Father’s Day ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice. Bought it for my dad for Father’s Day and he loved it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It's clean design is excellent for dressing up or every day wear. Never having to buy another battery is something I am still getting used to. The watch fit me perfectly after taking three links out of the bracelet. There is another set of adjusting holes in the clasp for fine tuning the fit, but I did not need to do that. Simple, classic, elegant, and accurate best describes this watch. Amazon's pricing and free shipping was also great, as was the delivery speed. One of my better purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Vwiz

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for as a gift for my husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: teacherkittycat

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: got this for my husband who already had a nice watch but was having trouble seeing the hands and reading the date. This one has a bit larger face with the black background and luminescent marks and is much easier to read. The month/date field is also a bit bigger and easier to read. It looks very classy/dressy. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks very businesslike, I added to my son solar watch collection
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son asked for... He has solar watches with a case... I added to his collection
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good. Keeps time very well and stays charged all ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 weeks. Looks and feels good. Keeps time very well and stays charged all the time, although I do not expose it to light except through ordinary use. I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, good price
customer_reviews.text: What a great bargain! Easy to grasp stem makes date adjustment a snap. Nice size and look. Also, size is adjustable both by removing links and by moving the clasp pin. I haven't had it long, but it appears to be at least as good as all my previous Seikos.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This problem is so annoying that I've decided to get rid of the
customer_reviews.text: Major problem with this watch is that you can't see the hands in bright light, e.g., in sunlight. More precisely, you can't distinguish the hands from the strong reflections off the dial surface and hence can't tell what time it is. This problem is so annoying that I've decided to get rid of the watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my boyfriend as an anniversary gift. He's not big on metal bands, but he kept telling me that he really liked this watch! As other reviews mentioned, it is a bit large and he got two links removed, but he's probably going to have one more removed as it's still a bit loose. Shipping was fast and the packaging was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Za

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old Seiko - 1969 vintage - was getting a bit dated. It is an older automatic, and I never had any trouble with it. But I really wanted the solar, and the stainless band. So this was a no-brainer for me. I highly recommend Seiko watches. You get great quality at very reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the price. Haven't had it very long yet, just hope the battery lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: tasty

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Stainless Steel Day/Date Solar Watch
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel Seiko solar watch is very well made and has secure flip clasp with push tabs. It is water resistant but not meant for swimming. Good directions come with the watch for changing the day/date and time.
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: Seiko Men's SNE039 Stainless Steel Solar Watch
product_meta.description:
Black dial enhanced by luminous silver-tone hands. Silver-tone stainless steel case with a silver-tone stainless steel band. Eco-Drive movement. 30 meters / 100 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Scratch Resistant Hardlex crystal. Solid caseback. Fold Over with Push Button Release clasp. Case size 37 mm x 9.6 mm. Band 19 mm x long. Seiko SNE039 Solar Watch.

Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This dress watch has a brushed and polished stainless steel case and bracelet which creates an elegant finish. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the black dial. LumiBrite hands and English/Spanish day/date calendar. 30 meters water resistant.




From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



See more

Solar. No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping.

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing.

feature_bullets: Solar-powered classic watch with sunray dial featuring logo under 12 o'clock, sword-shape hands, and date window at 3 o'clock
37 mm stainless steel case with Hardlex dial window
Stainless steel link bracelet with push-button clasp
